title: General Grant National Memorial: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit          Come visit  the final resting place of General and President  Ulysses S. Grant,  and his wife,  Julia D. Grant.               The memorial represents gratitude for the Civil War hero who helped preserve the union.   Architecturally, it exemplifies the mixture of classical forms and motifs, on a massive scale, that characterized turn-of-the-century architecture. Interior mosaics and sculptures reflect the desire, on the part of the Grant Monument Association and the National Park Service, to embellish the tomb with artistic pieces commemorating General Grant.       See the following to Plan Your Visit. Basic Information Directions & Transportation Things To Do Calendar Safety Accessibilty
